Power Your Business with Solar

AcmeSolar is the leading commercial solar installation company in Phoenix, Arizona. We help businesses reduce their energy costs and carbon footprint.

Our Services

  • Solar Panel Installation - Full commercial installations with premium inverters
  • System Maintenance - Preventive maintenance and monitoring
  • Energy Audits - Comprehensive assessment of your energy needs

Why Go Solar?

Our clients typically see a 40% reduction in energy costs within the first year. We handle all permitting and installation, making the transition seamless.

Integration with ServiceTitan and other field service management tools ensures your operations run smoothly.
